name: Jungle Rush (RGKD, kdreams)
description:
Jungle Rush is a competitive time-trial where you control clumsy animals and race to the top of the mountain as quickly as possible then challenge your friends to beat your High Score!

DID YOU THINK IT WOULD BE THAT EASY?

  You'll also need to survive and use your characters special abilities if you want to keep Going Up and finally see what lives at the peak of this wild track...


Keyboard + Mouse   ControllerMovementW, A, S, DL-Stick   (D-Pad)CameraMouseR-StickJumpSpaceSouthAbilityShiftWest / EastRestart                  Hold   RHold   LT + RT DEVELOPERS COMMENTS Stay in school kids... pick accounting

- kdreams

Dude, just submit it... it's time for rum

- RGKD
